channel.title: pCHead
channel.description:
Anyone got any ideas on how to make pCHead work in dialogues?
It always shows a mans head with black normal hair =p
Anyone? Thanks

item.title: pCHead
item.dc:creator: @killdogz killdogz
item.description:
@killdogz wrote:

If u want to change the npc head in the dialogue

search what he say’s here’s one that i pulled out of my server:

if (NPCID == 3712) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(3712).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome to Killdogz Scape have a nice stay.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(3712, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

Here’s how to change the npc head,

if (NPCID == 3712) {^thats the type of npc your gonna get it to say when u talk to him

sendFrame126(GetNpcName(3712).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884);^you see the “3712” thats the same npc

sendFrame75(3712, 4883);^and the 3712 is the npc will be displayed in the dialogue

So just change the 3712 to any npc number but you got to change all three for it to work.

Hope this helps. (not very good at explaining things)

Read full topic
